description: These crispy, chunky polenta chips are a real treat with truffle oil and parmesan on top.
name: Truffle & Parmesan Polenta Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C. Arrange the polenta chips in a single layer on a lined baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes. Serve with a drizzle of truffle oil and the rest of the grated parmesan and sea salt on top.

Pre-heat the oven to 180°C. Arrange the polenta chips in a single layer on a lined baking sheet and bake for 30 minutes. Serve with a drizzle of truffle oil and the rest of the grated parmesan and sea salt on top.
